message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product for sale. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm.  While the product looks great, I'm only comfortable paying $12,500 at this point.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss $13,750?
